meanings.definition: A person who studies or practices casuistry.
meanings.sent1: The casuists debated the ethical dilemma for hours.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to famous casuists throughout history.
meanings.sent3: The casuists tried to determine if eating dessert before dinner was morally acceptable.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ethics, the casuists are the detectives of right and wrong.
meanings.sent5: The image of the casuists poring over ancient texts will forever be etched in my mind.
